languages.text:
A voidborn character can re-roll any failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}, or skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a 20% chance of success. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Additionally, any enemy dodge or parry against a voidborn character has a 20% chance to fail after a successful roll.
languages.original_text:
Пустотнорожденный персонаж может повторно выполнять проваленные {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} навыков и {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристик{/g}, а также повторно атаковать, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняться{/g} или парировать после неудачных попыток с шансом успеха 20%. Этот шанс не может превышать базовый шанс успеха при броске.
Кроме того, когда противник успешно совершает уклонение или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} в бою с пустотнорожденным персонажем, с шансом 20% эта попытка становится неудачной.

traits.locale_text:
A void born character can reroll any failed attack, dodge, parry, characteristic, or skill test with a 20% chance of success. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Additionally, any enemy dodge or parry against a void born character has a 20% chance to fail after a successful roll.

A voidborn character can reroll any failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}, or skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a 20% chance of success. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Additionally, any enemy dodge or parry against a voidborn character has a 20% chance to fail after a successful roll.

A voidborn character can reroll any failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}, or skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a 20% chance of success. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Additionally, any enemy dodge or parry against a voidborn character has a 20% chance to fail after a successful roll.

languages.text:
Ein Leerengeborener kann jede misslungene Angriffs-, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweich{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschafts{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Fertigkeitsprobe{/g} mit einer 20 %igen Erfolgschance wiederholen. Diese Chance kann nicht größer sein als die Basiserfolgschance des Wurfs.
Außerdem besteht eine 20 %ige Chance, dass ein gegnerisches Ausweichen oder eine Parade gegen einen Leerengeborenen nach einem erfolgreichen Wurf fehlschlägt.
languages.original_text:
A voidborn character can re-roll any failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}, or skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a 20% chance of success. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Additionally, any enemy dodge or parry against a voidborn character has a 20% chance to fail after a successful roll.

traits.locale_text:
Ein Leerengeborener kann jede misslungene Angriffs-, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweich-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade-{/g}, Eigenschafts- oder {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Fertigkeitsprobe{/g} mit einer 20%igen Erfolgschance wiederholen. Diese Chance kann nicht größer sein als die Basiserfolgschance des Wurfs.
Außerdem besteht eine 20%ige Chance, dass ein gegnerisches Ausweichen oder eine Parade gegen einen Leerengeborenen nach einem erfolgreichen Wurf fehlschlägt.

languages.text:
Un personnage hors-monde peut relancer un jet de dés lié à une attaque, une {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, une {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}, une {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} ou un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de compétence manqué, avec 20 % de chances de réussite. Ces chances ne peuvent pas être supérieures aux chances de réussite de base du jet.
De plus, toute esquive ou parade ennemie contre un personnage hors-monde a 20 % de chances d'échouer après un jet réussi.
languages.original_text:
A voidborn character can re-roll any failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}, or skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a 20% chance of success. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Additionally, any enemy dodge or parry against a voidborn character has a 20% chance to fail after a successful roll.

traits.locale_text:
Un personnage hors-monde peut relancer un jet de dés lié à une attaque, une {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, une {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}, une {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} ou un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de compétence manqué, avec 20 % de chances de réussite. Ces chances ne peuvent pas être supérieures aux chances de réussite de base du jet.
De plus, toute esquive ou parade ennemie contre un personnage hors-monde a 20 % de chances d'échouer après un jet réussi.

languages.text:
当虚空之子攻击、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}或技能检定失败时，可以重新进行检定，重骰的成功率为20%。此成功率不会高于掷骰的基本成功率。
此外，敌人对虚空之子的闪避与招架动作，即便是掷骰成功之后，也仍然有20%的几率失败。
languages.original_text:
A voidborn character can re-roll any failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}, or skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a 20% chance of success. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Additionally, any enemy dodge or parry against a voidborn character has a 20% chance to fail after a successful roll.

traits.locale_text:
当虚空之子攻击、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}、属性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}或技能检定失败时，可以重新进行检定，重骰的成功率为20%。此成功率不会高于掷骰的基本成功率。
此外，敌人对虚空之子的闪避与招架动作，即便是掷骰成功之后，也仍然有20%的几率失败。

当虚空之子攻击、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}或技能检定失败时，可以重新进行检定，重骰的成功率为20%。此成功率不会高于掷骰的基本成功率。
此外，敌人对虚空之子的闪避与招架动作，即便是掷骰成功之后，也仍然有20%的几率失败。

languages.text:
Un personaje nacido en el vacío puede volver a tirar cualquier ataque, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} o de habilidad con una probabilidad de éxito del 20 %. Esta probabilidad no puede ser superior a la probabilidad de éxito básica de la tirada.
Además, cualquier esquiva o parada del enemigo contra un personaje nacido en el vacío tiene un 20 % de probabilidad de fallar aunque la tirada tenga éxito.
languages.original_text:
A voidborn character can re-roll any failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}, or skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a 20% chance of success. This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Additionally, any enemy dodge or parry against a voidborn character has a 20% chance to fail after a successful roll.

traits.locale_text:
Un personaje nacido en el vacío puede volver a tirar cualquier ataque, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de característica o de habilidad con una probabilidad de éxito del 20 %. Esta probabilidad no puede ser superior a la probabilidad de éxito básica de la tirada.
Además, cualquier esquiva o parada del enemigo contra un personaje nacido en el vacío tiene un 20 % de probabilidad de fallar aunque la tirada tenga éxito.

languages.text:
虚空生まれのキャラクターは、攻撃、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}/スキル{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}の失敗時、20%の確率で再判定できる。この確率は、基本成功確率以上にはならない。
さらに、虚空生まれのキャラクターに対する敵の回避や受け流しは、成功した場合でも20%の確率で失敗する。

This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Additionally, any enemy dodge or parry against a voidborn character has a 20% chance to fail after a successful roll.

さらに、虚空生まれのキャラクターに対する敵の回避や受け流しは、成功した場合でも20%の確率で失敗する。

Пустотнорожденный персонаж может повторно проходить проваленные {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} навыков и характеристик, а также повторно атаковать, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклоняться{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} после неудачных попыток с шансом успеха 20%. Этот шанс не может превышать базовый шанс успеха при броске.
Кроме того, когда противник успешно совершает уклонение или парирование в бою с пустотнорожденным персонажем, с шансом 20% эта попытка становится неудачной.

languages.text:
Uçsuzdoğan bir karakter; başarısız olduğu her türlü saldırı, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelik{/g} veya yetenek {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testlerine{/g} %20 başarı olasılığıyla tekrar girer. Bu olasılık, atılan zarın taban başarı olasılığından daha yüksek olamaz.
Ayrıca bir düşman, uçsuzdoğan bir karaktere karşı başarılı bir kaçınma veya savuşturma yaparsa bu girişim %20 olasılıkla başarısıza dönüşür.
languages.original_text:

This chance cannot be greater than the base success chance of the roll.
Additionally, any enemy dodge or parry against a voidborn character has a 20% chance to fail after a successful roll.
